addNewBountyPool(address,address,string,.details: Can only be called by the owner.

params._projectName: Name of the project that is hosting the bounty
params._projectWallet: Address that will be able to deposit funds, set APY and poolCap for the pool
params._referralEndTime: Timestamp up until the referral will be active
params._referralFee: Referral fee that the referrer will receive (in BPS), max 50%
params._referrer: Address of the individual that referred this bounty to The Saloon
params._token: Token to be used by bounty pool
